text.section:
An applicant for registration of a mark shall:
submit to the Secretary of State:
an application on the form that the Secretary of State provides; and
3 specimens or reproductions of the mark; and
pay to the Secretary of State a fee of $50.

An application shall be signed, under oath:
for an individual, by the individual;
for a partnership, by a partner; or
for a corporation or association, by an officer of the corporation or association.

A single application for registration of a mark:
may cover use of the mark with any number of goods or services in a single class; but
may not cover use of the mark with goods or services in different classes.
